page.title: 02FINE FARE STORE BISHOPBRIGGS
page.content: {FINE FARE SUPERMARKET}sells food (biggest seller), household and garden accessories. Opening hours: Mon-Fri 9 a.m.- 8 p.m.Sat 8.30 a.m. -5.30 p.m. From the {Manager }we learned that the average number of customers per week is 26 000. Busiest days are 1) Friday 2) Thursday.Customers pay by cash, cheque or credit card. 320 staff are employed. They use fork lift trucks (to move stock),pricing guns,calculators,tills.supplies come from their own factory in East Kilbride but the food in the bakery department is made on the premises.The {customers}we interviewed told us that they liked to shop for everything in one place.They found the self-service convenient and quick.Most came by car and shopped once a week. Some used the free bus service. All lived within three miles of the store.
